title: White kiteshield

properties.name: description
properties.value: The white kiteshield is a White Knight kiteshield that is members only. To wield a white kiteshield, the player must have completed the Wanted! quest and have at least 10 Defence, the same as black. One can either buy one from Sir Vyvin (with the Adept rank) or trade with another player. It has the same bonuses as a black kiteshield, but it has a +1 Prayer bonus. As with all white armour and weapons, it cannot be smithed.

Item ID6633

The white kiteshield is a White Knight kiteshield that is members only. To wield a white kiteshield, the player must have completed the Wanted! quest and have at least 10 Defence, the same as black. One can either buy one from Sir Vyvin (with the Adept rank) or trade with another player. It has the same bonuses as a black kiteshield, but it has a +1 Prayer bonus. As with all white armour and weapons, it cannot be smithed.

 Attack bonuses

 Defence bonuses
+17+19+18-1+18

[[File:White kiteshield detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''white kiteshield''' is a [[White Knight equipment|White Knight]] [[kiteshield]] that is [[members only]]. To wield a white kiteshield, the player must have completed the [[Wanted!]] [[quest]] and have at least 10 [[Defence]], the same as [[Black kiteshield|black]]. One can either buy one from [[Sir Vyvin]] (with the Adept [[White Knight rank|rank]]) or trade with another player. It has the same bonuses as a [[black kiteshield]], but it has a +1 [[Prayer]] bonus. As with all [[white armour]] and weapons, it cannot be [[Smithing|smithed]].
